column4: I have a question.  I found that I installed a program I want to use, but I'm not sure how to open it.  I can't find it in any dropdown menu, and I don't have an alias for it, I'm not sure what the path to it is
right click on your panel, add to panel, and add the deskbar
after installing the package, it should be listed in the accessories section of the "add to panel" dialog
